channel.title: How do I add an npc properly
channel.description: If there is a tut to this, give me the link please :]. And I want to add an npc which I am still new to servers. Made a server for first time like a week ago. I am trying to add an npc and put it in the coords that I want it in. Simple as that if anyone knows how to do it
